msg: propose apr_user_ family for user info, and re-sort the goofs

author: wrowe
msg: Clean up some status notes, and add symbol rename references for everyone
to kibitz before we close this book.  Feel free to add missing symbols,
these lists are from win32's exports lists of libapr.dll and libaprutil.dll.

author: wrowe
msg: Add -w3 -w4 options to toggle all .dsp files to build with higher or
lower order error checking.  Don't commit back -w4 versions :-)

author: wrowe
msg: Include windows headers in apr.h (.hw) and include apr.h within
apr_private.h for consistency.  Also provide exceptions for many
